column4: In grub, I need to select Microsoft Windows as Default Option. how to do that ?
Yes, but this system is used by children too. they dont know ubuntu ? how to select Microsoft Windows as Default Option in grub loader ?
edit your menu.lst, near the top, set "default" to "saved", and under the windows entry (the line following, leave no blank lines, or put it inside) add "savedefault" on a line of its own
